name: 李弘毅
objective:
內容包括第二定律、各種動力循環以及冷凍循環。
To provide students with the concepts and abilities of analyzing second law of thermodynamics, power cycles, refrigeration cycles and heat pump cycles.
schedule:
1. Entropy Analysis
2. Entropy Analysis
3. Entropy Analysis
4. Gas Power Cycles
5. Gas Power Cycles
6. Gas Power Cycles
7. Vapor and Combined Power Cycles
8. Vapor and Combined Power Cycles
9. Midterm Exam
10. Vapor and Combined Power Cycles
11. Refrigeration Cycles
12. Refrigeration Cycles
13. Refrigeration Cycles
14. Exergy Analysis
15. Exergy Analysis
16. Thermodynamic Property Relations
17. Thermodynamic Property Relations
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy: 作業及課程參與: 30%，期中考: 30%，期末考: 40%
materials:
Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach (10th Edition),Yunus A. Cengel, Michael A. Boles, Mehmet Kanoglu, McGraw-Hill, 2024.
References:
Fundamentals of thermodynamics (SI Edition), Claus Borgnakke, Richard E. Sonntag, Wiley, 2014.
熱力學 (第八版)，蔡健雄、張金龍、王耀南  編譯，東華書局，2016.
consultation: 開學後建立熱力學 (二) 課程 Line 群組
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）
